document_data.name: Home of the Stalwarts
document_data.staff:
Overblade [[Orrdun Fistright]]
{{Former}}[[Orm Talath]]
100 priests and 50 warriors
document_data.mainbody: The '''Home of the Stalwarts''' was a temple of [[Helm]] found in the city of [[Tethyr]]. As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], was one of the city's oldest buildings.
document_data.Services: The temple was overseen by Overblade [[Orrdun Fistright]], who took over for the much-beloved [[Orm Talath]]. The Overblade was served by five score [[Helmite]] [[priest]]s and the 50-strong Stalwart Knights, a branch of the [[Champions Vigilant#Stalwart Knights|Champions Vigilant]].
document_data.History: The Home of the Stalwarts was founded in the {{YearlinkName|1244}}.
